name: Old-Fashioned Scotch Eggs
author: P J K
summary: Here is an old family recipe for this hearty egg and sausage dish. This dish is high in fat so it's best if eaten only as a special treat
ingredients: 1 pound pork sausage, formed into 6 patties
directions: Place eggs in saucepan and cover with water
Cover, remove from heat, and let eggs sit in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes
Remove from hot water and cool; peel
In a large deep skillet heat about 1 inch of vegetable oil until hot
Place whole boiled eggs on top of sausage patty
Roll to form ball around the egg
Dip in beaten egg wash, then seasoned breadcrumbs
Deep fry in hot vegetable oil until meat is fully cooked
